pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This is used to force updates of packages that use electron-builder or electron-packager so they pick up security updates for the Chromium parts. Ebuilds that wish to update should add one of the following corresponding to a LTS branch:
virtual/electron-builder:14= virtual/electron-builder:13= virtual/electron-builder:12=
These versions are listed in: https://www.electronjs.org/docs/tutorial/support#currently-supported-versions
If autoupdate hasn't been done at the eclass level, ebuilds may choose to manually force update to the matching slot with the corresponding Electron release using best_version and electron-app_src_compile_electron_packager or electron-app_src_compile_electron_builder calls in the electron-app.eclass.
